cab.content:
298
Military Secret.
613
From Viceroy, Army Department, 17th June 1917.
(Received at India Office 2.10 p.m.)
8907. Mahsud operations. Lashkar of Mahsud encountered on 12th June, reported as dispersed to their homes, reasons given by Mahsuds is the heat. On night of llth-12th, Wazir Havildar of Militia commanding Tiarza post, having got his command out of the way by a ruse, deserted with 25 rifles and 13 boxes of ammunition. Tribal complicity not suspected.
Bj
